verbs.description: [V: smoked] [ARG1: honey - peppercorn salmon] i found this recipe in an alaska fishing guide now it the only way we do salmon the brine gives it a sweet caramelized coating and the hickory wood chips give it a distinct smoky flavor —judy ashby jamestown tennessee cook
